summary: Comprehensive testing of DomusVita v2.0 with real property data. All 35 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend fully functional including Dashboard, Immobilien (13 properties), Kontakte (all 5 roles), Instandhaltung (4 tickets), and Handwerker Mobile Portal. Photo dialog cancel button bug from iteration_3 is now FIXED.
passed_tests: Backend: All 35 pytest tests passed (100%)
Dashboard: Shows 13 Immobilien, 4 Leerstehende Einheiten, 4 Offene Aufgaben, 3 Anstehende Fristen
Dashboard: AI Einblicke section working with real data insights
Immobilien: All 13 real DomusVita properties displayed correctly
Immobilien: Filter by type (Pflegewohngemeinschaft) works
Immobilien: Filter by city (Berlin) works
Immobilien: Search functionality works
Immobilien: Grid/List view toggle works
Kontakte: All 6 contacts displayed with all 5 roles (Mieter, Eigentümer, Handwerker, Versorger, Behörde)
Kontakte: Filter by role works
Instandhaltung: All 4 maintenance tickets displayed
Instandhaltung: Tickets linked to real properties (Haus Hebron, WG Drachenwiese, etc.)
Instandhaltung: Status filters (Offen, In Bearbeitung) work
Handwerker Portal: Demo-Schnellanmeldung with Elektro Weber and Sanitär König
Handwerker Portal: Login flow works (click demo button, then Anmelden)
Handwerker Portal: Tickets page shows assigned tickets with stats
Handwerker Portal: Ticket detail page with all sections (status, address, photos, work report)
Handwerker Portal: Photo dialog opens correctly
Handwerker Portal: Photo dialog Abbrechen button NOW WORKS (bug fixed)
Handwerker Portal: Status update buttons visible (Unterwegs, Vor Ort, In Arbeit, Erledigt, Material fehlt)
seed_data_creation: Real DomusVita property data already seeded: 13 properties, 6 contacts, 4 contracts, 4 maintenance tickets, 26 units
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Real DomusVita data includes 13 Berlin properties (Haus Hebron, WG Kupferkessel, WG Drachenwiese, etc.), 6 contacts with all roles, 4 maintenance tickets. Handwerker Portal login requires: 1) Click demo button (Elektro Weber/Sanitär König), 2) Click Anmelden button. Photo dialog cancel button is now working with data-testid='photo-dialog-cancel'.
